name: Highway Patrol - a Police Quest Saga
name_original: Highway Patrol - a Police Quest Saga
description:
Stop the robbers by any means and become the most famous policeman!

Did not you always want to stop robbers? Stop them by any means?

Then you have your chance now on that tower defense game!

Show your skills as a highway cop and bring even the worst robbers to the track! You also get various traps available which you can then pay with the police account!

Every robber wave is different, it will challenge you, but in the end your effort will be worth it!

Learn from mistakes, improve your abilities, increase your perception and

become the best policeman in the world!

CHARACTERISTICS

* Place traps

* Different strategies to win

* Simple, clever and tricky waves

* Dynamic play through various combinations of falling

* Bonus mode "Sandbox" unlockable via highscore!
